scripts.test: set -x && meteor npm run test-headless && meteor npm run test-packages-headless
scripts.//: TEST_CLIENT=0, because there are currently no client tests; see `find -L package-tests/nog-multi-bucket`.
scripts.ls-test-packages: grep -i ontest packages/*/package.js | cut -d / -f 2 | grep -v nog-test
scripts.test-packages-watch: set -x && meteor test-packages --driver-package=practicalmeteor:mocha --settings _private/settings.json $(meteor npm run ls-test-packages | grep ^nog-)
scripts.test-packages-headless: set -x && TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome meteor --once test-packages --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --extra-packages mquandalle:jade@0.4.9 --settings _private/settings.json $(meteor npm run ls-test-packages | grep ^nog-)
